title: 11 Extraordinary Ways to Make Ordinary House Chores a Little Bit Better
content: Maintaining a clean home can be exhausting, and you’re not alone if the thought of spending your Sunday doing house chores just seems impossibly boring. But having the right tools to keep your space tidy and organized can make the experience so much more enjoyable. Arm yourself with these attractive yet practical housekeeping devices -- and you might even have some fun doing the weekly chores.           Au Naturel      Keep clutter at bay with this three-drawer storage organizer, made from bamboo and cotton. With three pull-out drawers made of breezy, striped cotton fabric, this organizer is an ideal storage solution for bathrooms, kids’ rooms or hallways. Once all of those extra knick knacks or toys are put away, this organizer’s clean and natural look will leave your space feeling fresh.           Laundry Made Elegant      This “Dry Clean Only” bag will offer a visual reminder to take care of your dry cleaning, while keeping your delicates organized in the meantime. Made from cotton canvas and with an elegant black and white finish, this bag won’t look unsightly displayed in your laundry or bathroom. When it’s time to go to the cleaners, durable side handles make this bag easy to transport.           Ironing in Paradise      Give your ironing board a fresh new look with this bamboo-patterned cotton cover. Fitted over a high quality foam and fiber padding, and treated to repel water and stains, this ironing board cover is made to last. And with a tropical, bright green look, ironing your clothes won’t feel so drab.           Scrub Like You Mean It      Lend a sense of humor to your dishwashing routine with these pink 100% latex gloves. Featuring tattoo-inspired slogans and symbols, like “wash hard” and “dry young,” these gloves will make you feel ready for even the grimiest of dishes.           Eco-Friendly Brush      Avoid that feeling of dread when you have to use a dirty old sponge, and invest in this wooden brush instead. With an ergonomic bamboo handle and natural palmyra bristles, this brush will hold up against countless dishwashing sessions. Reusable and with a clean, organic look, this is truly a kitchen accessory you can feel good about.           Herbal Tonic      Treat your wooden cutting boards, counters or tabletops with this all natural tonic. Made from white vinegar, rosemary oil and walnut oil, this tonic is meant to sanitize and moisturize your wooden surfaces. And with a fresh, clean scent, you’re sure to savor the cleaning process.           Household Bulletin Board      Don’t let stacks of bills, notes and keys prevent you from enjoying glistening kitchen countertops, when you could simply store them all in this multitasking organizer. Complete with a corkboard, mail slot and hooks, this organizer would be perfect in an entryway or kitchen. Post reminders on the corkboard, hang aprons or cooking tools on the hooks and keep your household clutter-free.         Get home and garden tips sent to your email inbox              Lined with Care      Keep your bathroom or bedroom drawers smelling fresh with these perfumed vintage toile liners. This set includes six sheets, each scented with a floral gardenia fragrance. Printed in a classic French toile pattern, these liners will give you a reason to keep your drawers organized.           Classic Compost Bin      Beautify your trash bin zone and lower your carbon footprint all at once with this cedar wood composter. Simply throw your compostable trash -- like egg cartons and vegetable trimmings -- away in this bin and let it breakdown into healthy soil for your garden. Made from natural, solid wood slats, this classic compost bin will keep your backyard looking tidy.           Retro Trash Can      If you have to keep your trash can in sight, why not make sure it actually adds to your decor? This small, retro-inspired trash can won’t seem like an afterthought sitting in the corner of your kitchen. Available in seven distinctive colors and with a foot pedal-controlled lift top, this trash can offers both convenience and style.           Let a Robot Do It      When you simply don’t have time to vacuum, turn instead to this compact robot vacuum cleaner. This vacuum will cross your floor in a random pattern, dusting and vacuuming all on its own for up to 90 minutes. And with a built-in rechargeable battery, this robot will be up for the task time and again, so you can cross this chore off your list.
